golden_rules.query: Is manual available in required language?
golden_rules.expected_value: Manual present in 11 supported languages
golden_rules.test_method: Check manual contains sections for English, Deutsch, Español, Suomi, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Norsk, Português, Svenska, 中文
golden_rules.failure_indication: Language support incomplete or missing required translations

golden_rules.query: Are page numbers correct for each language section?
golden_rules.expected_value: English p.3, Deutsch p.8, Español p.13, Suomi p.18, Français p.23, Italiano p.28, Nederlands p.33, Norsk p.38, Português p.43, Svenska p.48, 中文 p.53
golden_rules.test_method: Verify page numbers match table of contents
golden_rules.failure_indication: Pagination error or missing sections

golden_rules.expected_value: www.bandg.com loads and is operational
golden_rules.test_method: Attempt to access website URL provided in manual
golden_rules.failure_indication: Website unavailable or incorrect URL listed

golden_rules.query: Does unit power on when power is applied?
golden_rules.expected_value: Unit turns on automatically
golden_rules.test_method: Apply power to unit and observe startup
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unit remains off when powered - possible power supply issue

golden_rules.query: Does setup wizard appear on first startup?
golden_rules.expected_value: Setup wizard launches automatically
golden_rules.test_method: Power on unit after factory reset
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing initial configuration options

golden_rules.query: Does screen auto-lock activate when idle?
golden_rules.expected_value: Screen locks after period of inactivity
golden_rules.test_method: Leave unit idle and observe lock activation
golden_rules.failure_indication: Security feature not functioning

golden_rules.expected_value: Screen unlocks with right edge swipe
golden_rules.test_method: Swipe from right edge when locked
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect gesture recognition

golden_rules.expected_value: Screen unlocks with bottom swipe
golden_rules.test_method: Swipe from bottom when locked
golden_rules.failure_indication: Incorrect gesture recognition

golden_rules.expected_value: Home screen appears when Home button is selected
golden_rules.test_method: Click Home button and verify screen display
golden_rules.failure_indication: Home screen does not appear or is unresponsive

golden_rules.expected_value: System settings menu appears when clicked
golden_rules.test_method: Click Settings button and verify settings access
golden_rules.failure_indication: Settings menu does not appear or is inaccessible

golden_rules.expected_value: B&G CPU web server or internet browser opens
golden_rules.test_method: Click Browser button and verify web access
golden_rules.failure_indication: Browser does not launch or web access fails

golden_rules.expected_value: Currently active dashboard is highlighted in dashboard bar
golden_rules.test_method: Switch between dashboards and verify highlighting
golden_rules.failure_indication: Active dashboard not visually indicated

golden_rules.expected_value: User favorite dashboards visible in dashboard bar
golden_rules.test_method: Pin dashboard and verify it appears in dashboard bar
golden_rules.failure_indication: Pinned dashboards not showing or pin function fails

golden_rules.query: Can user edit dashboard from home screen?
golden_rules.expected_value: Yes, via press and hold gesture
golden_rules.test_method: Press and hold on dashboard tile on home screen
golden_rules.failure_indication: Edit menu does not appear after long press

golden_rules.expected_value: No, some dashboards have restricted editing
golden_rules.test_method: Attempt to edit different dashboard types
golden_rules.failure_indication: Edit options appear for restricted dashboards

golden_rules.expected_value: Yes, via press and hold on gauge
golden_rules.test_method: Press and hold on gauge to verify edit options appear
golden_rules.failure_indication: No edit options menu appears for gauges

golden_rules.query: What are the available dashboard creation methods?
golden_rules.expected_value: Blank dashboard, template, or saved dashboard
golden_rules.test_method: Verify all three options present in new dashboard menu
golden_rules.failure_indication: Missing one or more creation options

golden_rules.query: Can user pin dashboard to bar via long press?
golden_rules.expected_value: Dashboard moves to selected position on bar
golden_rules.test_method: Press and hold dashboard on home screen for 3 seconds
golden_rules.failure_indication: Dashboard does not respond to long press or cannot be moved to bar

golden_rules.query: Can user unpin dashboard from bar?
golden_rules.expected_value: Unpin option appears and dashboard can be removed
golden_rules.test_method: Press and hold pinned dashboard on dashboard bar
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unpin option does not appear or dashboard cannot be removed

golden_rules.query: Do pinned dashboards respond to horizontal swipe?
golden_rules.expected_value: Dashboard view changes when swiping left or right
golden_rules.test_method: Swipe horizontally across pinned dashboards
golden_rules.failure_indication: No response to swipe or jerky transition between dashboards

golden_rules.query: Can dashboard be pinned to occupied position?
golden_rules.expected_value: New dashboard overwrites existing pinned dashboard
golden_rules.test_method: Attempt to pin dashboard to position that already contains pinned dashboard
golden_rules.failure_indication: Cannot overwrite existing pinned dashboard position

golden_rules.query: Can Quick access menu be accessed?
golden_rules.expected_value: Menu appears when swiping from top edge of display
golden_rules.test_method: Swipe finger from top edge of screen downward
golden_rules.failure_indication: Quick access menu does not appear, touch functionality may be impaired

golden_rules.expected_value: User can modify gauge data display options
golden_rules.test_method: Access gauge settings menu and attempt to change displayed data
golden_rules.failure_indication: Unable to customize gauge display

golden_rules.expected_value: Gauge size can be adjusted
golden_rules.test_method: Select gauge resize option and attempt to change dimensions
golden_rules.failure_indication: Gauge size cannot be modified

golden_rules.expected_value: Dashboard settings can be changed
golden_rules.test_method: Access dashboard settings and attempt modifications
golden_rules.failure_indication: Dashboard attributes locked or unresponsive

golden_rules.query: Is manual available in required language?
golden_rules.expected_value: Manual present in 11 supported languages
golden_rules.test_method: Check manual contains sections for English, Deutsch, Español, Suomi, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Norsk, Português, Svenska, 中文
golden_rules.failure_indication: Language support incomplete or missing required translations
